mapper.sql: id, nickname, open_id, enterprise_name, license, corporation, phone, card, avatarurl, create_time, update_time, state, address
mapper.insert: insert into enterprise (id, nickname, open_id, enterprise_name, license, corporation, phone, card, avatarurl, create_time, update_time, state, address) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into enterprise
id,
nickname,
open_id,
enterprise_name,
license,
corporation,
phone,
card,
avatarurl,
create_time,
update_time,
state,
address,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update enterprise
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corporation = #{corporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatarurl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update enterprise set nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporation = #{corporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarurl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from enterprise where 1=1 and open_id = #{openId}

select e.address as address, e.id as enteprirseId,e. enterprise_name as enterpriseName, e.phone as enterprisePhone,a.longitude as longitude,a.latitude as latitude from activity a left join enterprise e on a.enterprise_id = e.id where 1=1 and a.id=#{aid}
select id as enteprirseId,enterprise_name as enterpriseName,avatarurl as avatarurl from enterprise where 1=1 and id=#{eid}
